name: BPA_TRGR_RSH_STUDY
description: This table stores the research study criteria that triggered the BPA.

columns.name: ALERT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the med alert record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: BPA_TRGR_RSH_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the research study that triggered this BPA.

columns.name: BPA_TRGR_RSH_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The research study status that triggered the BPA.

columns.name: ALT_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all alerts in the system.

columns.name: BPA_TRGR_ENROLL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the research study association that has been used to generate this BestPractice trigger.
